section.p: This method applies to scenarios where you want to use external audio data for playback. After enabling external audio rendering, you can pull remote audio data by calling the method. App can process the pulled original audio data before rendering to obtain the desired audio effect.

ul.li: After enabling external audio rendering, the App will not be able to obtain data from the callback.
Ensure that you call this method before joining a channel.
true: Enables the external audio sink.
false: (Default) Disables the external audio sink.

plentry.pd: @param sampleRate Sets the sample rate (Hz) of the external audio sink, which can be set as 16000, 32000, 44100 or 48000.

The number of channels for external audio rendering, which can be set to 1 or 2:
1: Mono
2: Stereo
